PRODUCT DATA 1:
Title: Sneaker Freaker The Rise and Fall of the adidas Samba and Everything In-Between - Features
Content: May 3, 2024 - And, it’s no secret that the ... didn’t know what the Samba was yet, they did now. Arguably, the adidas Samba has reached peak popularity in 2023 and 2024 has already seen a dip ....
Source: https://www.sneakerfreaker.com/features/adidas-samba-is-everywhere-trend-explained/

PRODUCT DATA 2:
Title: Reuters Adidas says demand for Samba shoes far outstrips supply | Reuters
Content: November 8, 2023 - Adidas inventory levels fell 23% year on year to 4.85 billion euros ($5.18 billion). That was a positive development, given that other apparel and footwear retailers in the United States and elsewhere have been struggling with excess stocks and cutting prices to move products off the shelves.
Source: https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/adidas-inventory-position-improving-better-than-planned-2023-11-08/

PRODUCT DATA 3:
Title: Reuters Adidas lifted by sales of Samba, Gazelle shoes while North America lags | Reuters
Content: April 30, 2024 - Adidas has been on a turnaround journey since the cancelled partnership with Ye ended its highly profitable Yeezy shoe line and it reported a loss for 2023, but the company's sales have recently been boosted by the popularity of its "terrace" shoes such as the Samba and Gazelle.
Source: https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/adidas-q1-growth-partly-offset-by-north-america-sales-decline-2024-04-30/
